short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find instances of "Thing" and make them glaringly obvious, hopefully so someone can burn them with a flamethrower!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Thing Finder will search for instances of the word "thing" on any web page and replace it with "[OMG A THING]", and show a banner to alert the user that a "Thing" is on the current page. The general purpose is to have fun finding such pages which use the word to see how prevalent it is in speech.
